@description.name: @description
@description.body: This class stores the information needed to instruct a running test to wait. It is thrown as an exception to be caught by the method executing the test.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: delay {Integer?} The amount of time in milliseconds to wait
@param.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
deferredFunction {Function?} The function to run after the timeout
 has expired.
@param.description:
The function to run after the timeout
 has expired.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: context {Object?window} Optional execution context for deferredFunction

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The function to run after the timeout has expired

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The context in which the timeout function should be executed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
